title: Untitled Track 1
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I came from the bottom, now I'm reaching for the light
Every setback just another reason I fight
Dreams in my mind, yeah, they burnin' all night
Turning every wrong into something that's right

[Chorus]
We rise, no matter the fall
Keep pushin' till we break through it all
From the streets to the stars, we gon' crawl
Until the dream feels ten feet tall

title: Untitled Track 2
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
We met under the silver moonlight
Your hand in mine felt so right
Every laugh was a melody
Now the world feels like it's meant for me

[Chorus]
Stay with me, we'll chase the dawn
We'll write our story, keep moving on
No matter the night, our light will shine
You and me till the end of time

title: Untitled Track 3
lyrics:
[Intro]
Crank the amps, let the thunder roll
Feel the fire deep inside your soul

[Verse 1]
Weâ€™re breaking chains, no turning back
Running wild on a midnight track
Every shout is a battle cry
With the wind and the sparks flying high

[Chorus]
Raise your voice, let the walls come down
We own this night, we own this town
Every heart beats loud and free
Rock and roll's our destiny
